title: Designates state and city universities of New York as participating agencies for voter registration form distribution and assistance
summary: Designates state and city universities of New York as participating agencies for voter registration form distribution and assistance; permits independent institutions to do the same upon request; requires SUNY and CUNY independent institutions to offer each applicant an application for an absentee ballot.
